% docs/latex_theme/fonts.tex
\usepackage{fontspec}

\newcommand{\HBSetupFonts}{%
  \IfFontExistsTF{Avenir Next Rounded}{%
    \setmainfont{Avenir Next Rounded}
    \setsansfont{Avenir Next Rounded}
  }{%
    \IfFontExistsTF{Helvetica Rounded}{%
      \setmainfont{Helvetica Rounded}
      \setsansfont{Helvetica Rounded}
    }{%
      \IfFontExistsTF{Avenir Next}{%
        \setmainfont{Avenir Next}
        \setsansfont{Avenir Next}
      }{%
        \setmainfont{Helvetica}
        \setsansfont{Helvetica}
      }%
    }%
  }%
  \IfFontExistsTF{JetBrains Mono}{%
    \setmonofont{JetBrains Mono}[Scale=MatchLowercase]
  }{%
    \setmonofont{Menlo}[Scale=MatchLowercase]
  }%
}

\AtBeginDocument{\HBSetupFonts}
